channel.title: How do i change what npcs say
channel.description: title says it all[br][size=1]Posted on: May 05, 2007, 06:12:43 AM[/size][hr]please help

item.title: How do i change what npcs say
item.dc:creator: @H_Y_P_E_R H Y P E R %
item.description:
@H_Y_P_E_R wrote:

look for a npc thats already talking search in NPCHandler.java what it says and change it

heres one of mine:

if (npcs[i].npcType == 2909) { // rigth if (misc.random2(30) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "use key on red portal to go main land, sadly the cunt blood realm got banned";

Read full topic
item.source: How do i change what npcs say

item.title: How do i change what npcs say
item.dc:creator: @h3ll_pure h3ll pure
item.description:
@h3ll_pure wrote:

Hey, To change what NPCâ€™s say go into NPChandler.Java and search

moo

Scroll down untill you find the NPC that you want to change then change it to what you want it to say

save compile run

Hope I helped
